subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Corey Hart’s run-scoring single led a three-run rally in the eighth inning last night as the Milwaukee Brewers rallied to defeat the host Atlanta Braves, 4-1, to stay close to the Chicago Cubs in the National League Central.
snippet: Corey Hart’s run-scoring single led a three-run rally in the eighth inning last night as the Milwaukee Brewers rallied to defeat the host Atlanta Braves, 4-1, to stay close to the Chicago Cubs in the National League Central.
